trans-unit.source: Represents a field that is displayed as an image in a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 表示在資料繫結控制項中顯示為影像的欄位。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> class is used by data-bound controls (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>) to display an image for each record displayed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>類別可供資料繫結控制項 (例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>) 以顯示每一筆記錄顯示的影像。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object is displayed differently depending on the data-bound control in which it is used.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>物件顯示的方式會根據使用它的資料繫結控制項。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control displays an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object as a column, while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control displays it as a row.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制顯示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>物件做為資料行，而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項顯示為一個資料列。

trans-unit.source: To display images, you must bind an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object to a field from a data source that contains the URL of an image.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示的影像，您必須將繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>物件欄位從資料來源，其中包含影像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這是藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The URL value can be formatted by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlFormatString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用格式化的 URL 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlFormatString%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Each image can also have alternate text associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 每個映像也可以有與其相關聯的替代文字。

trans-unit.source: This text is displayed when an image cannot be loaded, or is unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 無法載入，映像，或無法使用時，會顯示此文字。

trans-unit.source: Browsers that support the ToolTips feature also display this text as a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 支援工具提示功能的瀏覽器也會將此文字顯示為工具提示。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the alternate text for a displayed image by using one of the following methods:
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用下列方法之一來指定顯示影像的替代文字：

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.AlternateText%2A> property to specify alternate text that applies to all images.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.AlternateText%2A>屬性來指定適用於所有影像的替代文字。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextField%2A> property to bind a field from a data source to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A> property of each image.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextField%2A>屬性繫結至資料來源的欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A>每個影像的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to have different alternate text for each image displayed.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您擁有不同的顯示每個影像的替代文字。

trans-unit.source: When binding data, you can optionally format the alternate text by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextFormatString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當資料繫結，您可以選擇性地使用格式化的替代文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextFormatString%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When the URL value for an image is `null`, an image cannot be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 影像的 URL 值時`null`，無法顯示影像。

trans-unit.source: You can display an alternate image for `null` field values by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以顯示的替代影像`null`藉由設定欄位值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullImageUrl%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Instead of an alternate image, you can display alternate text by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullDisplayText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 而不是替代的映像，您可以藉由設定顯示的替代文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullDisplayText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: By default, all declared fields are displayed in a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，所有宣告的欄位會顯示在資料繫結控制項中。

trans-unit.source: You can hide an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object in a data-bound control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 您可以隱藏<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>藉由設定資料繫結控制項中的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: You can customize the header and footer sections of an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object.
trans-unit.target: 您可以自訂的頁首和頁尾區段<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>物件。

trans-unit.source: To display a caption in the header or footer section, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderText%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterText%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 若要在頁首或頁尾區段中顯示的標題，請設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderText%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterText%2A>屬性，分別。

trans-unit.source: To display an image in the header section instead of text, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示影像，而非文字標頭區段中，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderImageUrl%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The header section can be hidden in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 標頭區段可能會隱藏在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>物件藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A>屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: Some data-bound controls (such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control) can show or hide only the entire header section of the control.
trans-unit.target: 某些資料繫結控制項 (例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項) 即可顯示或隱藏只控制項的整個標頭區段。

trans-unit.source: These data-bound controls do not support the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A> property for an individual data-bound field.
trans-unit.target: 不支援這些資料繫結控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A>個別繫結的資料欄位的屬性。

trans-unit.source: To show or hide the entire header section of a data-bound control, use the control's `ShowHeader` property (if available).
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示或隱藏在資料繫結控制項的整個標頭區段，使用控制項的`ShowHeader`屬性 （如果有的話）。

trans-unit.source: You also can customize the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object (font color, background color, and so on) by setting the style properties for the different parts of the field.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以自訂的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>藉由設定欄位的不同部分的樣式屬性的物件 （例如字型色彩、 背景色彩等等）。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different style properties.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出不同的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: Style property
trans-unit.target: 樣式屬性

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the child Web server controls of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object.
trans-unit.target: 子系 Web 伺服器控制項的樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>物件。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the footer section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object.
trans-unit.target: 頁尾區段的樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>物件。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the header section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object.
trans-unit.target: 標頭區段的樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>物件。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the data items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object.
trans-unit.target: 中的資料項目的樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>物件。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to display an image.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>物件存放至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項來顯示影像。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is commonly used when adding fields to a dynamically created data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 將欄位加入至動態建立的資料繫結控制項時，通常會使用這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: To dynamically add an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object to a data-bound control, create a new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object, set its properties, and then add it to the data-bound control's field collection.
trans-unit.target: 若要以動態方式加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>物件資料繫結控制項，請建立新<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>物件、 設定其屬性，並將其加入資料繫結控制項的欄位集合。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, add the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項，加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Although you can dynamically add fields to a data-bound control, it is strongly recommended that fields be statically declared and then shown or hidden, as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 雖然您以動態方式可以將欄位加入資料繫結控制項，強烈建議的欄位以靜態方式宣告，然後顯示或隱藏，視需要。

trans-unit.source: Statically declaring all your fields reduces the size of the view state for the parent data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 以靜態方式宣告所有的欄位可減少的父資料繫結控制項的檢視狀態的大小。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use this constructor to dynamically add an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> collection of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用這個建構函式，以動態方式將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alternate text displayed for an image in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> 物件中影像所顯示的替代文字。

trans-unit.source: The alternate text for an image displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> 物件中顯示影像的替代文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.AlternateText%2A> property to specify the alternate text for the images displayed in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.AlternateText%2A>屬性來指定在顯示之影像的替代文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>物件。

trans-unit.source: The alternate text is displayed when an image cannot be loaded or is unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 無法載入或無法使用映像時，會顯示的替代文字。

trans-unit.source: Browsers that support the ToolTips feature also display this text as a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 支援工具提示功能的瀏覽器也會將此文字顯示為工具提示。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set, all images displayed in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object share the same alternate text.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性設定時，所有映像中顯示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>物件共用相同的替代文字。

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can bind the alternate text to a field in a data source by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextField%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以繫結的替代文字到資料來源中的欄位設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextField%2A>而不是這個屬性的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to have different alternate text for each image displayed.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您擁有不同的顯示每個影像的替代文字。

trans-unit.source: If both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.AlternateText%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextField%2A> properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextField%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.AlternateText%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextField%2A>設定的屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextField%2A>屬性會優先。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.AlternateText%2A> property to specify the alternate text for all images displayed in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.AlternateText%2A>屬性來指定替代的文字中顯示的所有映像<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether empty string ("") values are converted to <see langword="null" /> when the field values are returned from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出從資料來源傳回欄位值時，是否將空字串 ("") 值轉換成 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> values should be converted to <see langword="null" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> 值應該轉換成 <see langword="true" />，則為 <see langword="null" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes the user may enter an empty string for a field value when updating or inserting records.
trans-unit.target: 有時候使用者可能會為欄位值，更新或插入資料錄時輸入空字串。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A> property to specify whether an empty string value is automatically converted to `null` when the data field is updated in the data source
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A>屬性來指定空字串值是否會自動轉換為`null`資料欄位的資料來源中的更新時

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> class displays `null` as empty strings by default.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>類別顯示`null`為預設的空字串。

trans-unit.source: To display a different value, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullDisplayText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示不同的值，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullDisplayText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" />-derived object that receives the copy.
trans-unit.target: 接收副本之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> 衍生的物件。

trans-unit.source: Copies the properties of the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> object to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 將目前 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> 物件的屬性複製到指定的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.CopyProperties%2A> method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A> method to copy the properties of the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object to another.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.CopyProperties%2A>方法透過呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A>方法來複製目前的內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>到另一個物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.CreateField%2A> method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A> method to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.CreateField%2A>方法透過呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A>方法建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the field from the data source that contains the values to bind to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText" /> property of each image in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料來源中的欄位名稱，這個欄位的值將繫結至 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText" /> 物件中每個影像的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the field to bind the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText" /> property of each image in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 欄位名稱，這個欄位將繫結 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText" /> 物件中每個影像的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextField%2A> property to specify the name of the filed from the data source that contains the values to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A> property of each image in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextField%2A>屬性來指定名稱的欄位從資料來源，包含要繫結至值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A>屬性中的每個映像的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>物件。

trans-unit.source: The enables you to have different alternate text for each image displayed.
trans-unit.target: 可讓您擁有不同的替代文字顯示每個映像。

trans-unit.source: The alternate text is displayed when an image cannot be loaded or is unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 無法載入或無法使用映像時，會顯示的替代文字。

trans-unit.source: Browsers that support the ToolTips feature also display this text as a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 支援工具提示功能的瀏覽器也會將此文字顯示為工具提示。

trans-unit.source: You can specify alternate text that applies to all images by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.AlternateText%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定藉由設定適用於所有影像的替代文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.AlternateText%2A>而不是這個屬性的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.AlternateText%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextField%2A> properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextField%2A> field takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.AlternateText%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextField%2A>設定的屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextField%2A>欄位的優先順序。

trans-unit.source: The following example code demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextField%2A> property to specify the name of the field from the data source that contains the values to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A> property of each image in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextField%2A>屬性來指定來源的資料中的欄位名稱，包含要繫結至值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A>屬性中的每個映像的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string that specifies the format in which the alternate text for each image in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> object is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定字串，指定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> 物件中每個影像之替代文字的呈現格式。

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies the format in which the alternate text for each image in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> object is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 字串，指定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> 物件中每個影像之替代文字的呈現格式。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that now special formatting is applied to the alternate text.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示未將特殊格式套用至該欄位值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextFormatString%2A> property to specify a custom format for the alternate text values of the images displayed in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextFormatString%2A>屬性來指定自訂格式中所顯示之影像的替代文字值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>物件。

trans-unit.source: The format string is applied only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextField%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 格式字串套用時，才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextField%2A>屬性設定。

trans-unit.source: It is not applied when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.AlternateText%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 無法套用時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.AlternateText%2A>屬性設定。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you need to modify the original value contained in the field.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要修改之欄位中包含的原始值，這非常有用。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextFormatString%2A> property is not set, the alternate text values do not get any special formatting.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextFormatString%2A>屬性未設定、 的替代文字值不會收到任何特殊格式設定。

trans-unit.source: The format string can be any literal string and usually contains a placeholder for the field's value.
trans-unit.target: 格式字串可以是任何常值字串，而且通常包含了該欄位值的預留位置。

trans-unit.source: For example, in the format string "Item Value: {0}", the "{0}" placeholder is replaced with the value of the fields specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextField%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在格式字串"項目值: {0}"，"{0}"預留位置會取代所指定的欄位值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextField%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The rest of the format string is displayed as literal text.
trans-unit.target: 格式字串的其餘部分會顯示為常值文字。

trans-unit.source: If the format string does not include a placeholder, the field's value from the data source is not included in the final display text.
trans-unit.target: 如果格式字串不包含預留位置，從資料來源欄位的值是不會包含在最後顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The placeholder consists of two parts separated by a colon (":") and wrapped in braces ("{}"), in the form `{A:Bxx}`.
trans-unit.target: 以冒號分隔的兩個部分所組成的預留位置 (":") 和包裝在括號 （"{"） 格式`{A:Bxx}`。

trans-unit.source: The value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the field value's index in a zero-based list of parameters.
trans-unit.target: 冒號之前的值 (`A`一般範例中) 以零為起始的參數清單中，指定欄位值的索引。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is part of the formatting syntax.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數是格式化語法的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Because there is only one field value in each cell, this value can only be set to 0.
trans-unit.target: 因為每個資料格中只能有一個欄位的值，這個值只可以設定為 0。

trans-unit.source: The colon and the values after the colon are optional.
trans-unit.target: 冒號和冒號後面的值是選擇性的。

trans-unit.source: The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the format in which to display the value.
trans-unit.target: 冒號後面的字元 (`B`一般範例中) 指定要在其中顯示值的格式。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the common formats.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出常見的格式。

trans-unit.source: Format character
trans-unit.target: 格式字元

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Displays numeric values in currency format.
trans-unit.target: 以貨幣格式顯示數值。

trans-unit.source: Displays numeric values in decimal format.
trans-unit.target: 以十進位格式顯示數值。

trans-unit.source: Displays numeric values in scientific (exponential) format.
trans-unit.target: 以科學記號 （指數） 格式顯示數值。

trans-unit.source: Displays numeric values in fixed format.
trans-unit.target: 固定格式來顯示數值。

trans-unit.source: Displays numeric values in general format.
trans-unit.target: 以一般格式顯示數值。

trans-unit.source: Displays numeric values in number format.
trans-unit.target: 數字格式顯示數值。

trans-unit.source: Displays numeric values in hexadecimal format.
trans-unit.target: 以十六進位格式顯示數值。

trans-unit.source: The format characters are not case sensitive, except for `X`, which displays the hexadecimal characters in the case specified.
trans-unit.target: 格式字元不區分大小寫，除了`X`，其中顯示十六進位字元指定的大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The value after the format character (xx in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display.
trans-unit.target: 格式字元 (一般的範例中為 xx) 後的值會指定有效位數或小數位數，若要顯示數的字。

trans-unit.source: For example, the format string "{0:F2}" displays a fixed-point number with 2 decimal places.
trans-unit.target: 例如，格式字串"{0: f2}"會顯示定點 2 的小數位數。

trans-unit.source: For more information on formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextFormatString%2A> property to apply a custom format to the alternate text values for the images in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextFormatString%2A>屬性，將自訂格式套用至中影像的替代文字值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the field from the data source that contains the values to bind to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image.ImageUrl" /> property of each image in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料來源中的欄位名稱，這個欄位的值將繫結至 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image.ImageUrl" /> 物件中每個影像的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the field to bind to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image.ImageUrl" /> property of each image in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 欄位名稱，這個欄位將繫結至 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image.ImageUrl" /> 物件中每個影像的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField%2A> property to specify the name of the field to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A> property of each image in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField%2A>屬性來指定要繫結至欄位的名稱<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A>屬性中的每個映像的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>物件。

trans-unit.source: The specified field must contain the URLs for the images to display in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object.
trans-unit.target: 指定的欄位必須包含影像中顯示的 Url<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>物件。

trans-unit.source: You can optionally format the URL values by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlFormatString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選擇性地藉由設定格式化 URL 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlFormatString%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When the filed value is `null`, an image cannot be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 當已歸檔的值是`null`，無法顯示影像。

trans-unit.source: You can display an alternate image for `null` field values by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以顯示的替代影像`null`藉由設定欄位值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullImageUrl%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Instead of an alternate image, you can display alternate text by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullDisplayText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 而不是替代的映像，您可以藉由設定顯示的替代文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullDisplayText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example code demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField%2A> property to specify the name of the field to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A> property of each image in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField%2A>屬性來指定要繫結至欄位的名稱<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A>屬性中的每個映像的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string that specifies the format in which the URL for each image in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> object is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定字串，指定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> 物件中每個影像之 URL 的呈現格式。

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies the format in which the URL for each image in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> object is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 字串，指定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> 物件中每個影像之 URL 的呈現格式。

trans-unit.source: The default is the empty string ("") , which indicates that no special formatting is applied to the URLs.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示 URL 未套用任何特殊格式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlFormatString%2A> property to specify a custom format for the URLs of the images displayed in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlFormatString%2A>屬性來指定自訂格式中所顯示之影像的 url<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>物件。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you need to generate a URL, such as when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object simply contains the file name.
trans-unit.target: 當您需要產生的 URL，例如當時這非常有用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>物件只包含檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlFormatString%2A> property is not set, the URL values do not get any special formatting.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlFormatString%2A>屬性未設定、 URL 值不會收到任何特殊格式設定。

trans-unit.source: The format string can be any literal string and usually contains a placeholder for the field's value.
trans-unit.target: 格式字串可以是任何常值字串，而且通常包含了該欄位值的預留位置。

trans-unit.source: The rest of the format string is displayed as literal text.
trans-unit.target: 格式字串的其餘部分會顯示為常值文字。

trans-unit.source: The following example code demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlFormatString%2A> property to apply a custom format to the URL values for the images in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlFormatString%2A>要套用自訂格式的 url 屬性值中的影像<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>物件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary" /> used to store the values of the specified cell.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary" />，用於儲存指定儲存格的值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell" /> that contains the values to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell" />，包含要擷取的值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include the values of read-only fields; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示包含唯讀欄位的值，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Fills the specified <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary" /> object with the values from the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary" /> 物件的值填入指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.ExtractValuesFromCell%2A> method is a helper method used to retrieve the values of the fields from the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell> object in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.ExtractValuesFromCell%2A>方法是 helper 方法，用來擷取欄位的值從指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell>物件存放至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>物件。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: This method does not have a return value.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會傳回值。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the field values are returned by reference through the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> object passed in for the `dictionary` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，將欄位值傳回透過傳<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>物件傳入的`dictionary`參數。

trans-unit.source: After the method has been called, iterate through the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> object to access the field values.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫方法之後，逐一查看<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>物件來存取的欄位值。

trans-unit.source: To include the read-only field values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell> object, pass in `true` for the `includeReadOnly` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要包含在唯讀欄位值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell>物件，傳入`true`如`includeReadOnly`參數。

trans-unit.source: The value to transform.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的值。

trans-unit.source: Applies the format specified by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlFormatString" /> property to a field value.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlFormatString" /> 屬性所指定的格式套用至欄位值。

trans-unit.source: The transformed value.
trans-unit.target: 經過轉換的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.FormatImageUrlValue%2A> method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> class to apply the format specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlFormatString%2A> property to a field value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.FormatImageUrlValue%2A>方法是 helper 方法，供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>類別，以套用所指定的格式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlFormatString%2A>屬性設為欄位值。

trans-unit.source: When extending the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> class, you can override this method to perform a custom formatting routine.
trans-unit.target: 在擴充<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" />類別，您可以覆寫此方法以執行自訂格式化常式。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the value used for a field's value when rendering the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> object in a designer.
trans-unit.target: 在設計工具中呈現 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> 物件時，擷取欄位值所使用的值。

trans-unit.source: The value to display in the designer as the field's value.
trans-unit.target: 要在設計工具中做為欄位值顯示的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.GetDesignTimeValue%2A> method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> class to determine what value to display for a field when rendering an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object in a designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.GetDesignTimeValue%2A>方法是 helper 方法，供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>類別以決定何值轉譯時，顯示欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>設計工具中的物件。

trans-unit.source: If real data cannot be retrieved from the data source at design time, the value returned by this method is displayed instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果無法擷取實際資料從資料來源，在設計階段，改為顯示這個方法所傳回的值。

trans-unit.source: When extending the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> class, you can override this method to return a different value to display for the field in a designer.
trans-unit.target: 在擴充<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" />類別，您可以覆寫此方法以傳回不同的值，以顯示在設計工具中的欄位。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> that contains the alternate text value to transform.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" />，包含要轉換的替代文字值。

trans-unit.source: Applies the format specified by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextFormatString" /> property to the alternate text value contained in the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataAlternateTextFormatString" /> 屬性所指定的格式套用至指定之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> 物件中所包含的替代文字值。

trans-unit.source: The transformed value.
trans-unit.target: 經過轉換的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.GetFormattedAlternateText%2A> method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> class to apply the format specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlFormatString%2A> property to the alternate text value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.GetFormattedAlternateText%2A>方法是 helper 方法，供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>類別，以套用所指定的格式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlFormatString%2A>替代文字值的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The alternate text value is contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> object specified by the `controlContainer` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 替代文字值包含於<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>所指定物件`controlContainer`參數。

trans-unit.source: When extending the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> class, you can override this method to perform a custom formatting routine.
trans-unit.target: 在擴充<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" />類別，您可以覆寫此方法以執行自訂格式化常式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> that contains the field value.
trans-unit.target: 包含欄位值的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the field for which to retrieve the value.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取其值的欄位名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" />, passed by reference, that represents the properties of the field.
trans-unit.target: 以傳址方式傳遞的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" />，表示欄位的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the value of the specified field from the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的控制項中擷取指定的欄位值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the specified field.
trans-unit.target: 指定的欄位值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.GetValue%2A> method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object to determine the value of the specified field.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.GetValue%2A>方法是 helper 方法，供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>物件，以判斷指定之欄位的值。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="controlContainer" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="controlContainer" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The data item associated with the container control is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 與容器控制項關聯的資料項目為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The field specified by the <paramref name="fieldName" /> parameter could not be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到 <paramref name="fieldName" /> 參數所指定的欄位。

trans-unit.source: When extending the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> object, you can override this method to provide custom routine to determine a field's value.
trans-unit.target: 在擴充<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" />物件，您可以覆寫這個方法以提供自訂的常式，以決定欄位的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if sorting is supported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果支援排序，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The data control that contains the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> 的資料控制項。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Always returns <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 一律傳回 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.Initialize%2A> method is called by the data control with which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object is associated to perform basic object initialization for instances of the field, before the field is ever added to a field collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.Initialize%2A>方法由資料控制項與其呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>物件與其相關聯執行基本物件初始化的欄位之前的欄位加來檢視欄位集合, 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Data controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.Initialize%2A> method in their `CreateChildControls` methods before other methods such as `CreateRow` are called to create specific rows with data.
trans-unit.target: 資料控制項，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.Initialize%2A>方法在其`CreateChildControls`方法，這類其他方法之前`CreateRow`呼叫以建立特定的資料列與資料。

trans-unit.source: Call this method when you are writing a custom data-bound control that uses <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell> objects to perform basic initialization for an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法，當您撰寫自訂資料繫結控制項所使用的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell>物件來執行基本的初始設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>物件。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method if your <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>-derived type requires any object initialization before it populates <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell> objects with data or controls in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.InitializeCell%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個方法，如果您<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>-衍生型別需要的任何物件初始設定之前它所擴展,<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell>物件與資料或控制項中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.InitializeCell%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell" /> to initialize.
trans-unit.target: 要初始化的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCellType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCellType" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the row.
trans-unit.target: 資料列之以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell" /> object with the specified cell type, row state, and row index.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的儲存格類型、資料列狀態和資料列索引，初始化指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.InitializeCell%2A> method is implemented by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>-derived types to add text and controls to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell> object of a data control that uses tables to display a user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.InitializeCell%2A>方法由實作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>-衍生型別加入文字和控制項加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell>利用資料表來顯示使用者介面 (UI) 控制項的物件。

trans-unit.source: These data controls create the complete table structure row-by-row when the control's `CreateChildControls` method is called.
trans-unit.target: 這些資料控制項建立完整的資料表結構的資料列逐列當控制項的`CreateChildControls`方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.InitializeCell%2A> method is called by the `InitializeRow` method of data controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.InitializeCell%2A>方法透過呼叫`InitializeRow`方法的資料控制項，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>。

trans-unit.source: Call this method when you are writing a custom data-bound control that uses <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell> objects to initialize the cells of the table structure with data or controls.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法，當您撰寫自訂資料繫結控制項所使用的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell>物件初始化的資料格的資料或控制項的資料表結構。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method when you are writing an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>-derived class.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個方法，當您撰寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>-衍生的類別。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell" /> to initialize.
trans-unit.target: 要初始化的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell" /> object with the specified row state.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的資料列狀態，初始化指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.InitializeDataCell%2A> method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> class to initialize a cell in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.InitializeDataCell%2A>方法是 helper 方法，供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>類別初始化中的資料格<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>物件。

trans-unit.source: When extending the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> class, you can override this method to perform a custom initialization routine.
trans-unit.target: 在擴充<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" />類別，您可以覆寫此方法以執行自訂的初始化常式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> object when the value of the field specified by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定文字，當 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> 屬性所指定的欄位值為 <see langword="null" /> 時，<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField" /> 物件中將顯示此文字。

trans-unit.source: The text to display when the value of a field is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 當欄位值為 <see langword="null" /> 時，所要顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: When the value of the field specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField%2A> property is `null`, an image cannot be displayed in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object.
trans-unit.target: 欄位的值時所指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField%2A>屬性是`null`，映像無法顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullDisplayText%2A> property to specify the text to display in the image's place.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullDisplayText%2A>屬性來指定要在映像的位置顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The text usually indicates that the normal image is not available or cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 此文字通常表示一般影像無法使用或找不到。

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can display an alternate image when the field value is `null` by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullImageUrl%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以替代的映像時顯示的欄位值是`null`藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullImageUrl%2A>而不是這個屬性的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullImageUrl%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullDisplayText%2A> properties are both set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullImageUrl%2A> property has precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullImageUrl%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullDisplayText%2A>同時設定屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullImageUrl%2A>屬性擁有優先權。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullDisplayText%2A> property to specify the text to display when the value of the field specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullDisplayText%2A>屬性來指定要顯示欄位的值所指定的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField%2A>屬性是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to an alternate image displayed in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> object when the value of the field specified by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定替代影像的 URL，當 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> 屬性所指定的欄位值為 <see langword="null" /> 時，<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField" /> 物件中將顯示此替代影像。

trans-unit.source: The URL to an alternate image displayed when the value of a field is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 當欄位值為 <see langword="null" /> 時，所顯示替代影像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: When the value of the field specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField%2A> property is `null`, an image cannot be displayed in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object.
trans-unit.target: 欄位的值時所指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField%2A>屬性是`null`，映像無法顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullImageUrl%2A> property to specify the URL to an alternate image to display.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullImageUrl%2A>屬性來指定要顯示替代的影像 URL。

trans-unit.source: The alternate image is usually an image that indicates that the normal image is not available or cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 替代的映像通常是指出一般影像無法使用或找不到映像。

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can simply display text when the field value is `null` by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullDisplayText%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以只顯示文字的欄位值時`null`藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullDisplayText%2A>而不是這個屬性的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullImageUrl%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullDisplayText%2A> properties are both set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullImageUrl%2A> property has precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullImageUrl%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullDisplayText%2A>同時設定屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullImageUrl%2A>屬性擁有優先權。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullImageUrl%2A> property to specify the URL to an alternate image to display when the value of the field specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.NullImageUrl%2A>屬性來指定替代的映像時所指定的欄位值顯示的 URL<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField%2A>屬性是`null`。

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的來源。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Binds the value of a field to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將欄位值繫結至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.OnDataBindField%2A> method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> class to bind the value of a field in the data source to a corresponding cell in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.OnDataBindField%2A>方法是 helper 方法，供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>類別，以將資料來源中欄位的值繫結到對應的儲存格<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> object contains a control that is not a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox" /> control in edit mode and is not an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image" /> control with a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label" /> control in read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> 物件包含的控制項不是編輯模式中的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox" /> 控制項，也不是唯讀模式中含有 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image" /> 控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: When extending the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> class, you can override this method to perform a custom binding routine.
trans-unit.target: 在擴充<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" />類別，您可以覆寫此方法以執行自訂繫結常式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the values of the field specified by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField" /> property can be modified in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示是否可以在編輯模式下修改 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField" /> 屬性所指定的欄位值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the field values cannot be modified in edit mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示在編輯模式下無法修改欄位值，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: By default, the values of the field specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField%2A> property can be modified by the user when a data-bound control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，所指定的欄位值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField%2A>資料繫結控制項處於編輯模式時，可以由使用者修改屬性。

trans-unit.source: To prevent the user from changing the values of the field, set this property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免使用者變更欄位的值，請將此屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: In an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField%2A> property usually contains the name of the field that contains the URLs to the images displayed in the object.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.DataImageUrlField%2A>屬性通常會包含欄位，其中包含要顯示在物件中之影像的 Url 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.ReadOnly%2A> property to indicate that the field values that represent the URLs to the images displayed in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object cannot be modified in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.ReadOnly%2A>屬性來表示欄位值，代表中顯示之影像的 Url<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>處於編輯模式下，無法修改物件。

trans-unit.source: Represents the "this" expression.
trans-unit.target: 代表 "this" 運算式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.ThisExpression> field is used to indicate that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object should bind to the data source itself rather than a filed of the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.ThisExpression>欄位用來指出<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>物件應該繫結至資料來源本身而不是已歸檔的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the value returned by the object's <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> method will be displayed in the field.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，物件所傳回的值<xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>方法將會顯示在欄位中。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the controls contained in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> object support callbacks.
trans-unit.target: 決定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField" /> 物件中包含的控制項是否支援回呼。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.ValidateSupportsCallback%2A> method is a helper method used to determine whether the controls contained in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField> object support callbacks.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField.ValidateSupportsCallback%2A>方法是 helper 方法，用來判斷控制項是否包含在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>支援回呼的物件。

trans-unit.source: This method has been implemented as an empty method (a method that does not contain any code) to indicate that callbacks are supported.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法已經作為空方法 （不包含任何程式碼的方法），表示支援回呼實作。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> class can override this method to indicate whether the controls contained by the field support callbacks.
trans-unit.target: 類別衍生自<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" />類別可以覆寫此方法，指出是否根據欄位支援回呼所包含的控制項。

trans-unit.source: To indicate that callbacks are supported, implement this method as an empty method that does not throw an exception; otherwise, throw an exception with a useful message describing why callbacks are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 若要指出支援回呼，實作這個方法作為空方法不會擲回例外狀況。有用的訊息，說明為什麼不支援回呼，否則擲回例外狀況。
